website_summaries.verdict: The reasonable $80 price tag, dual-core processor, and Android 4.0, make the LG Optimus L9 a reliable midlevel handset.
pros: The LG Optimus L9 has a snappy dual-core CPU, 4G, Android 4.0, and a 1080p HD camera
cons: The Optimus L9's battery drains quickly, it has a poor audio speaker, and it comes preloaded with too much bloatware

customer_reviews.title: The phone worked fine when we got it
customer_reviews.text: I was originally going to replace the screen on my boyfriend's dad's phone when it broke, but when a screen is $20 and you add the time and frustration to replace it, a new phone for this price was entirely worth it. The phone worked fine when we got it, and was a great replacement. The only problem was a small crack in the frame on the side, but it didn't impede it's use, and for the price I really couldn't argue.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: It is cheap and it does its job well!
customer_reviews.text: It is a good phone, but it has some limitations to it. First, it has a very low built-in memory, so if you are an app lover, look for a different phone. Second, you cannot install apps on microSD card b/c the phone just doesn't like it, even through root and Android SDK program. Though it does get the job done. I have had no complaints with its performance so far. The occasional restart is required, but that is a standard that any computer electronic owner should do.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive phone
customer_reviews.text: It's better than a starter phone and you can't beat the price anywhere. I've had it for nearly a year and it has worked very well for me. GPS and WiFi work great. Speaker volume is a little low when using speaker phone and GPS. Camera is OK for the price. Only about 2G of space for applications and no good way to put apps on the SD card. I don't use many large apps anyway, but with apps getting bigger, I'll probably need to upgrade in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: Rikku review of the optimus L9
customer_reviews.text: what I am thinking of this phone I have been using this phone for almost 3 weeks now and I love it this phone had replaced my failing LG Thrill 4G that I had getting used to having only 3 buttons instead of 4 is pretty easy the camera quality is amazing and this phone is louder than the thrill which i really like i would certainly recommend this to anyone using t-mobile or a t-mobile based carrier like Solavei for example this and other I know also love this phone
customer_reviews.author: Rikku

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smartphone, so I don't know too much about the technicalities, but I like it. The interface is similar to the ipod/iphone with a few differences. It's pretty easy to use and very customizable. I read in other reviews that it doesn't have much memory, so I bought a 16GB microSD card for it. I've had a few issues with apps crashing, but for my simple purposes (facebook, calling, texting, a few games, calendar, alarm, camera), it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Violet

customer_reviews.title: slow and sticky with gps issues.
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my wife, she does not like it. Phone is slow and sticky and the gps navigation has never worked on this phone. made many attempts to use gps, it never was able to find a gps signal, and if it does, it looses the signal shortly after. the stickiness sucks too.
customer_reviews.author: BoonTronics

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: In the four months that I have been been using this phone, I have experienced nothing but problems. The phone overheats, won't hold a charge, and seems to have a mind of its own, randomly changing my settings, hanging up in the middle of calls, drawing red squiggles across the screen, opening apps for no apparent reason, mis-dialing, and exhibiting a host of other problems. I would give it a single star, except that the price was good. Actually, I suppose saying that the price was good for this shoddy instrument is like saying that I every time I go to the local burger joint I get food poisoning--but the prices are so good!
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, love the screen size
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone and would have given it five stars, but I didn't know that the 32g card I purchased separately would not hold apps. I don't really need that much space for pictures and music. I have to delete apps whenever I want to add apps. Found out that was a google decision. Anyway, I would have still bought this phone because the price at $180 was great with no contract.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a techy. I could care less about the latest phones and all of that stuff but I did want something to bring me into the 21st century. LOL. when videoing the picture can be a little dark so I do see the difference with this being a mid level Android phone but I am good with it because I don't do a lot of extra anyway. I don't utilize it to handle bills and bank accounts, although I could. It is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: TANYA27

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this phone. You just cant go wrong getting this phone for the money. I gave it four stars because I would like to remove some apps that I will never use but can't. I worry about running out of storage but never did. The call quality is very good. So is the texting. Cameras are average but have many adjustments and flash. If this phone get broken or lost I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: OGL

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your dollar
customer_reviews.text: The phone is the best bang for my dollar vs. others in this price range. You can always find another phone that is better for $50 more and then one better than that one for $50 more etc. So set your budget and go for it. Since t-mobile has the best deals on the plans and you buy the phones out right this is a good deal. T-Mobile halted the jellybean role out for these phones for now due to issues with it. You can always root and flash the room to what you want. SD card is only used to store pics, music, but not apps. That is why I have dinged the phone rating.
customer_reviews.author: Von Bren

customer_reviews.title: Very good build quality and display
customer_reviews.text: This phone surprised me. It replaced my Samsung Galaxy II, and it is so much better than that phone. It beats that phone in every department especially the battery life, and wi-fi connectivity. Now i know why google outsources the nexus phones to LG, because "they try harder". Samsung seems all marketing hype to me now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taneja

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: It's considered to be a budget phone but it is a lot better than some of the other T-Mobile phones that I have had. It is fast and recently came out with an upgrade to 4.1.2 version I believe. The best part is that it is easy to root and once it is rooted, you can remove the bloatware, which makes it even smoother. It cost me less than $200 and I would highly recommend this phone to anyone who doesn't need the latest and greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Keoni

customer_reviews.title: best phone under 250$ price range
customer_reviews.text: pros:Big display very fast phone 1ghz dual core processor no lacks beautiful U.I micro sd card slot, decent camera, lightweight, stylish Cons: the L9 Lacks an ambient light sensor for automatic screen brightness adjustment little storage space 1.somthing gb of internal storage
customer_reviews.author: Yan Carlos Morel Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: This phone has a sleek design and clear display. The processor is fast and the memory is adequate. The breadth of apps available is almost unlimited because of the Android OS. This phone appears to be carefully engineered and crafted. Great little device.
customer_reviews.author: O-Coaster

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy
customer_reviews.text: the phone was reconditioned apparently to different factory standards. Battery drains quickly and phone does not respond well to commands. At this point, I might as well keep the darn thing, but if your in the market for this phone, or any other I suggest you not purchase it here.
customer_reviews.author: V. Albarez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very satifaite of my purchases and the respect of the delivery deadlines
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A solid, affordable smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smartphone for the price. It is quick, functional, and sleek. A bit on the large side, which makes for a nice screen size, but somewhat hard to fit in pockets. Photo quality is mediocre. As noted apps download only to internal memory (2gb) so it is limited, but should be more than enough for most useful apps. Does everything I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: mtnsojourner

customer_reviews.title: cheap unlocked android phone for cheap price
customer_reviews.text: a powerful cheap unlocked android phone currently running Ice Cream Sandwich but should get upgrade to Jelly Bean shortly. Note that until Jelly Bean update all apps can ONLY be store on internal memory which is about 2gb...
customer_reviews.author: P.K.

customer_reviews.title: Large screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father who has a hard time seeing with his 3 inch touchscreen phone. Loves the fact that he can see the letters without his glasses and can easily text and convert speech to text. I also have this phone too and it is so far the best phone that does not give me problems.
customer_reviews.author: nvromero

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a previous LG model
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone on my pay-as-you-go T-mobile minutes only account. I have both wi-fi and bluetooth enabled at all times so the battery requires daily charging. When not in my car and I disable bluetooth the battery drain is reduced considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Ssl

customer_reviews.title: Product not as shown in image
customer_reviews.text: In images it is shown that these L9 are in black OEM boxes and not in Prepaid boxes bu I'm very disappointed to have received them in prepaid boxes but that makes my family thinks I bought them at Walmart anyways the phones are good I can't complain for the price has nice features and fast enough processor to get things done.
customer_reviews.author: Zaki

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was terrible. It wouldn't dial half the time, then it would drop calls and I would have to turn off the phone and turn it back on to get it to call the person back. My text would hardly ever send and it was not my service) I have the same service now and none of these issues). However, the seller has a great return policy and returned my money with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the momey... nothing spectacular.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this phone for the past few months and it has been pretty good. It's a very decent phone especially for the price. Pros: Cheap, big screen, runs smoothly. Neutral: screen quality is just okay. Cons: camera quality is a little sucky, there aren't any cool features, internal storage is pitiful. I would highly recommend for anyone looking for an okay phone for a small price(:
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was expecting plus more
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, compared to the Optimus T I had before it, this one is incredible. It very user friendly, has a great battery life and does everything I had wanted my last phone to do. I have not had any issues so far. For the price it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Been using this phone for about a month now. This is a good phone for the price. It has a decent-sized screen, good resolution/quality, and feels solid. It has plenty of features and responds quickly. Battery life is quite good and the sound is fine. I took a star off due to poor sensitivity of the screen (with or without a protector) and all the bloatware you can't remove from the phone. Otherwise, it's a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, loved the size of this
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, loved the size of this, however I did send back only because we went with a different carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I had an HTC and I give it to my son and purchased this one for myself, I have no regrets. It is a great phone with a very good camera, also it fit my budget and has all the features that another phone would have. I have been asking the question over and over why is it that some phones are so expensive when most the features are the same. I would recommend this phone to anyone who is looking for a reasonable good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Khadija Vaid

customer_reviews.title: not a good customer services experience
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived not working propertly... I was not able to hear callers when they called; was only able hear callers by using the speaker option on the phone. I thought it was "operator " error so I took the phone to the local T Mobile store. Ttey confirmed via electronic dynostic test the phone was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: I used the phone for all of about 20 minutes and it has some sort of weird glitch where it navigates on its own back and forth rapidly so I took my sim card out and put it back in my old phone. I was very disappointed. As far as the condition & appearance that was fine and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: KryStan R Kane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Affordable Android Phone!
customer_reviews.text: My old phone was cracked and I was tired of it, I asked T-Mobil if there is an alternative to get a new phone and they told me the only way is to get an upgrade. I'm against upgrading my line so I ordered this and it works better than getting a new upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Jov

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: INCREDIBLE battery life. Best battery out of any smartphone I've ever used. Very fast and stable. Great form factor, beautiful design. Call quality is excellent. Screen is very good. Cons (kinda) Internal storage is lacking. You will need LGPWN and link2sd. Just google it. No automatic brightness sensor. However, you won't need it because the battery life is great. I keep mine on 80-100% all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: he loved it, lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my son, he loved it, lasted a long time, would recommend for a teenager and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: not the best, not the worst
customer_reviews.text: decent phone, not the best, not the worst. But does the job
customer_reviews.author: JaysDMC

customer_reviews.title: The phone and cover both good
customer_reviews.text: I wrote the write-up under the phone cover instead of the phone here. Both items have served me well. I want repeat the write-up, but it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: SB_Tops

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, though their may be better ones available at this point in time
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone in this price range. I have no regrets with it. At this point, I think the competition in the $170-$200 price range has gotten a bit tougher though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Cosmetically its a 5 star rating, and its performance is also excellent. There is only one concern I have; the battery gets extremely hot. So! I will make precautionary purchase of another battery. I believe the battery they sent with the unit is generic. Otherwise I'm pleased with my purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.author: O.Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's stated that the phone was new and when it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's stated that the phone was new and when it stopped working I sent it in under warranty... The phone was returned to me, and I was told the phone was refurbished along with the serial number being changed and they could not fix it...
customer_reviews.author: marjoriej

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the phone
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone because the OS would work with my Jawbone UP. It has done the job. It seems to be a good phone - was easy to get it set up and doing what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: LisaKaye

customer_reviews.title: Like it it does the job so that's what i paid for.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job so far so good it hasn't crapped out on me yet we will see in a year how fast it is out of date and they tell me they don't sell parts for that old phone any more
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: With a day's worth of battery available, this little guy will make the call and get you there too. The wifi calling is one of the best parts of the phone and makes texting/calls in basements a breeze. Very happy with this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy K

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus L9 P769, 4G (T-Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: A decent cellphone. Got it for my daughter.. The camera on the phone is not that good. But there are free app to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Shankar HSV

customer_reviews.title: Good phone.
customer_reviews.text: Decent amount of phone for the price. Not the latest and greatest phone but reasonable capability for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone and I recommeded to friends, and they love it, too. Great phone for the price. 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good value.  Solid phone.  Stable wifi calling
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid mid-range phone. Great for the price. Built well. Decent screen. Very light weight. I use ti primarily for wifi calling as I live outside the US. And it is very stable with wifi calling with almost no dropped calls or missed calls that can be common with Tmobile wifi calling. My only negative is the complete lack of a notification light which means you can't tell if you got a message, call, anything. You can't even tell if its charging. But only 1 star off for that.
customer_reviews.author: dko3tgk

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Notification and ringtone sounds aren't loud enough for me and would like an option for a repeat notification for texts. Also when the phone is off it needs to tell you the actual time a text came in. A low battery tone would be good too, but I downloaded an app for that. Funny thing is, that runs the battery out quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was great, came with usb cord and charger. Worth it, i don't regret it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: I'm stuck on these
customer_reviews.text: I had another, just like this one. My wife claimed it because of the large screen...so I had to get another one. Perhaps not as deluxe as an Apple...but it is a lot smarter than I am....EZWillie
customer_reviews.author: ezWillie

customer_reviews.title: Bought As Gift
customer_reviews.text: The phone has worked as a new unit and so far performed flawlessly-looks like a new unit. I recommend this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Hrailey

customer_reviews.title: Poor man's smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Not the ultimate smart phone on the market, and certainly NOT as expensive as one. This is a good one if you need to do all, period
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a loyal LG customer when it comes to cell phones due to the great hardware they offer off contract for reasonable prices. After leaving Virgin Mobile for T-Mobile (family plan) I needed a phone that worked on the T-Mobile network and after research found that this phone would likely be the best in my price range. Even though the specs are much worse than my friend's Galaxy Nexus 3, the responsiveness is much better and prompted him to root his phone due to being showed up by this cheap phone. Also, LG updated the phone to Jelly Bean recently through an OTA update. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Epitaph64

customer_reviews.title: Wife's Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my wife. She is in love with it. Does everything she wanted at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: pool_gabo@hotmai.com
customer_reviews.text: VERY BAD PRODUCT, asked for a new phone and upon arrival noticed that the headset does not work without headphones came apart, and the battery seems to be used by download each time, I would like to replace this product with the same but better.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone. It works great and is very light, it does drain the battery fast but its my own fault. I use it a lot!! Cons: ONLY 2gb of space.
customer_reviews.author: Debora O.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for T-mobile for some reason amazon refunded me so I'm ok. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: From Venezuela
customer_reviews.text: first phone in the box did not bring me the headphones, second the phone is not released I had to pay here in Venezuela for me to release him, third battery not last even half a day I think this bad because in less than 3 hours without using it is discharged to 50% is tremendous phone but do not know what happened in there.
customer_reviews.author: nicolas rojas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. Lightweight, great interface. The memory is smaller than most smart phones but it is still a high performing product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I highly encourage that this product be avoided. 29 days after I purchased this phone it started shutting off at random times. However the seller's return policy is only for 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Surprising good phone
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nexus 4 but T-Mobile refused to give it Wifi-Calling. I live in a home with no T-Mobile coverage and really need Wifi-Calling to make and receive important calls. This phone did the job for me. It is almost as fast as previous own Galaxy Nexus. Jelly Bean update made it faster. Pros: strong radio and wifi signal, good price Cons: bloat T-Mobile junks, hard to root, no support from xda developers, no ambient light sensor
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: Best choice for us! Great Product. We ordered it to go with our Walmart Family Plan. It was added at no cost and internet is free. Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L. Trechsel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Simple, intuitive and has all the features you need for a smartphone. Would definitely recommend. It is also a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderluster

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through almost 30 phones in my life time. Really sad I know. This one is by far the best one I have gotten. The touch screen is super easy to use, and it has so many apps and widgets that you can use. Texting on this phone is a breeze, as it has SWIPE. You won't go wrong buying this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Da Nita Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Love my LG Opitmus
customer_reviews.text: I want to buy another one for my husband!! Starting my Christmas shopping early this year!! This phone has more bells and whistles than my last phone but it is not OVER KILL. I use my phone to take care of my Ebay business when away from home and this phone does the job... perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Nunca prendió
customer_reviews.text: A parte de que me pusieron la batería que no era, luego de que la compré, resulta que el teléfono no prende!! No sirve para nada. Besides I put the battery that was not, after I bought it, is that the phone will not start! No useless.
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Three of us in the family got this phone. We all love it and it is easy to use. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Whiteguy1

customer_reviews.title: Great, limited device
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as a back-up for our family as an alternative to paying for insurance each month. I tested out the device for about 2 months and it worked flawlessly, as long as I didn't ask too much from it. Keep in mind, with the L9's limited processing power and internal memory, it won't behave like you're top of the line models, but with a little consideration, it a passable introduction to Android or a reliable little backup.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D

customer_reviews.title: LG. P769
customer_reviews.text: Got the phone in time great phone, nice size sreen, good response, owns several smartphone needed this for my carrier t-mo. Surprising the battery last more than a day considering the resolution HD. Definely can't go wrong with the Lg 769.
customer_reviews.author: Hossein Gebahi

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus L9 P768
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this item. I chose the above rating because compared to prior mobile devices I've had, this one tops them all. I dislike the fact the "back" buttom is not responsive. If I'm in text mode and want to back out...the device doesn't always respond to this command.
customer_reviews.author: Carletta C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rectified answer my friend. Delivered very good product by the company at the appointed time and product quality recommendo the Company.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Rafael Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Its an Ok phone
customer_reviews.text: Its a great phone but, did not care for the graphics or the camera. Pictures did not come out as clear as my other phone. Sending it back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilamarie71

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone got here right before a trip! Perfect timing! Beautiful phone, brand new, never opened. Everything was included. I'm in an area where I have to rely on wifi and the wifi/wifi calling works great! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Louissa Douyon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good features for the price. Performs as good as the more expensive phones. But the camera is okay for ocassional use. Would definitely recommend for entry level smartphone users.
customer_reviews.author: Ajit P.

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like the super crisp screen. The battery runs out quickly. Overall excellent value. Why pay twice as much for other phones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: The price is great compared to other comparable devices. It is easy to use. You need to spend some time to learn how to use a lot of its capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: E. Danial Doss

customer_reviews.title: The phone is running too slow. It seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is running too slow . It seems to me I had not purchased a smartphone rather. It has been just 3 months i've purchased the mobile and it is running too slow for a smartphone
customer_reviews.author: aditya karthik gorrapati

customer_reviews.title: I love the celular for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got at $179 dolars and it was a bargain for me, i like the celular, it looks nice and fulfills all my expectations...
customer_reviews.author: Omar Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: ... phone it self is really slow the front camera sucks it takes horrible pictures & it freezes up
customer_reviews.text: The phone it self is really slow the front camera sucks it takes horrible pictures & it freezes up fast
customer_reviews.author: Chezarae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in a phone. Easy to use, easy to customize, good features, good battery life
customer_reviews.author: kathysoshore

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Has all the bells and whistles that I need as a non-geek person. My husband, who is a geek, is very impressed with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: The best phone I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I have ever owned or used. Everything works excellently and fast. I strongly suggest giving this phone a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Boca Bimmer

customer_reviews.title: Opinion of Phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone. It is amazing for the price. Just make sure you order a case cover and screen cover for overall protection. I recommend this phone to anybody who wants more for less.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Fitts

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: great phone, especially for the price! Its fast, sleek and elegant. Has a great camera and lots of T-mobile apps that you probably will never use...
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This phone has great talk quality as well as the other features considering the price. A good alternative to the high end phones.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good phone, storage space is very small, however. Processing speed starts to slow after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: really like this phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone does everything I like and want. The only con is like most cell phones the battery has to be charged often.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E Spear

customer_reviews.title: love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my daughter and she loves it. She learns something new about the mini computer everyday. This is an excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Lg optimus l9
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone for the price, battery life is good, but the camera is a little crappy, hopefully it gets updated to android 4.2.2
customer_reviews.author: Nandeep Ravur

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best phone in its price range. I am definitely not a heavy app user - the phone is used mainly to talk/text/email. It looks very stylish, and I like how it is slim and easily fits into my pocket. I am also happy with the battery life - I use my phone all the time to communicate throughout the day and I usually still have 40% left before going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryotaro T.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Not too good on the battery life. Hard to understand why certain notices don't stop popping up. But overall good phone for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Yisrael Hochman

customer_reviews.title: l bought this phone and it needs unlock code, ...
customer_reviews.text: l bought this phone and it needs unlock code, can any one help me how to get my unlock code for free.
customer_reviews.author: Suleiman Khazali

customer_reviews.title: Phone works great but had significant cosmetic damage
customer_reviews.text: each corner of the phone was chipped, maybe i just had bad luck. look great with a case around it
customer_reviews.author: Colee Williams

customer_reviews.title: uninformed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have the right size simple card ...that would of been good knowledge before order....not happy
customer_reviews.author: Clara Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: It is what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it is as good as I expected. It may be good as the new smartphone worth more than $500, but it is ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: qq

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: You really cant beat this phone for the price it is. Although the Nexus phone just dropped in price to $199 so thats another option.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: THis phone is the best! I love it a lot. It is a good size to text with and never falls out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Orr

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: a great phone would buy another one thanks this is really nice phone again thanks this a 5 star phone
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good service very responsible'm very happy with the product thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Angel Rojas Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. Have had no problems as of yet! I am impressed with the quality of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jr1528

customer_reviews.title: New to Android
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone just takes forever to learn a new system. If you are a high tech person will be no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great budget phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money. Looks and feel like a high end phone. UI & features work as intended. Only con is that onboard memory is 4gig.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Vasquez

product_meta.title: LG Optimus L9 P769, 4G (T-Mobile)
product_meta.description:
The latest and greatest of the Optimus line, is the LG Optimus L9. This phone has a sophisticated, slim design that will fit any from your purse to your pocket. Running on Android 4.1.2 (Jelly Bean) with a powerful 1.0 Ghz Dual-Core processor your experience when surfing the internet, updating your facebook status, and playing your app will be silky smooth. With Quickmemo, you can capture your screen and make notes with your finger then share them online, by text and email. With Smartshare you can simply send your videos to your smartshare enabled tv. With a sweet 5.0 megapixel camera and LED flash lets you capture continuous pictures in a row and with panorama shot, you can capture a beautiful picture of the skyline. Worried about a shaky picture, just say cheese and your picture will be snapped! So why are you still reading this? Go ahead and add this beautiful LG Optimus L9 in Excellent condition to your cart now!
